pageContext.claim: “I wouldn't use the word 'produced' [for the video shown at the news conference]. All they did was took some clips, and they just ran them for you. And the reason they did is to keep you honest. Now, I don't think that's going to work.”
pageContext.analysis: The video was clearly produced. It was full of a series of false or misleading claims, which portrayed the initial months of the administration’s covid-19 response as successful.
